author: Tim Hume, VICE News
title: Coronavirus Has Arrived In the World's Biggest Refugee Camp: ‘Like Nothing We've Ever Seen Before’
description: “Our assumption — which is an unfortunate, but reasonable one to make — is that once it’s in the camps, nearly everyone will get it.”
content:
For months, aid agencies have feared the arrival of coronavirus in the worlds largest refugee settlement, the sprawling camps of Bangladeshs Coxs Bazar district, where about 855,000 people live in overcrowded and dirty conditions. 
 Now, the first case of CO… [+4915 chars]
